programmes.show_description: In the mid-70s Diddy David Hamilton was on Radio 1 AND Radio 2 at the same time! And these are a choice selection of his records of the week - his "Hamilton's Hotshots"!
Experience the magic of the 70s, where every beat was a spell and every song a timeless enchantment!
Classic hits from just 1 year - 1976!
Mark Goodier with 1976's big music award winners. What was Rolling Stone magazine's 'Best Single' and who had the 'Best Selling Song' in South Africa?
Whether you've kids or you were a kid in the 70s yourself, these are the 50 biggest singalong classics of the decade - in order!

programmes.show_name: All Day- It's A MASSIVE 70s Party!
programmes.show_description: From hippies to punk rockers, via folk, funk, soul & disco - these are the classic songs that made the 70s!
Two hours of funny videos, silly songs and novelty hits - all of them amazing and all in the best possible taste!
Today we'd call it Cheesy Pop! Back then it was Bubblegum Pop & TISWAS Sally has a prime selection including David Cassidy, Mungo Jerry, Lynsey De Paul, Tony Orlando & The Osmonds.

programmes.show_name: All Day- It's A MASSIVE 70s Party!
programmes.show_description: From hippies to punk rockers, via folk, funk, soul & disco - these are the classic songs that made the 70s!
Incredible facts and amazing trivia about some of the decade's most famous songs and videos! This is two hours of Radio 1 legend Bruno Brookes asking 'Can You Believe It?!'

programmes.show_name: Did They Really Do That? Top 30
programmes.show_description: Thirty fabulously great, but awful, chart hits and videos - all with that certain cringe factor attached. Did they really do that? They certainly did!
Seventies music power to play loud! Work out your speakers with some pure power pop and rock including Undertones, Elton, and the Who!
Another 60 minutes of hits and headlines from the penultimate year of the decade when Anna Ford became ITV's first ever female news reader and the TV licence fee climbed to Â£25!
Pop Groups ruled the 70s and they came from all quarters! From Germany's Boney M, Sweden's Abba & America's Village People to the UK's Queen, Police & Showaddywaddy.
From hippies to punk rockers, via folk, funk, soul & disco - these are the classic songs that made the 70s!
Pop groups ruled the 70s and came from all quarters! From Germany's Boney M, Sweden's ABBA and the UK's Queen, Police and Showaddywaddy - Tony Blackburn counts down the definitive 25.
From hippies to punk rockers, via folk, funk, soul & disco - these are the classic songs that made the 70s!
Classic hits from just 1 year - 1975!
Mark Goodier with 1975's big music award winners. Who got 'Single of the Year' from The Academy of Country Music & which UK singer got his star on the 'Hollywood Walk of Fame'?
Classic hits from just 1 year - 1975!
Brothers, sisters, husbands and wives - we'll keep it in the family with 90 mins of top tunes from The Bee Gees, Abba, The Osmonds, The Nolans and others, all on the way!
Classic hits from just 1 year - 1973!
Thirty minutes of back-to-back number 1s from 1973 - including Suzi Quatro, Donny Osmond & The Sweet! With Mr Charts himself - Mark Goodier.
Classic hits from just 1 year - 1973!
1973 was another top year in music, as Glam Rock ruled, Paul McCartney did Bond & the UK had its biggest Christmas chart battle ever! Simon Bates has the story - month by month.
Classic hits from just 1 year - 1973!
Folk, pop and glam rock - but guaranteed 100% cool cats & groovy guys from the first half of the 70s. With Bowie, Cat Stevens, Mott The Hoople and Free.
Over-bearded men and leftfield ladies - all with fabulous tunes! These are alternative hits from the West Coast, the underground and the counter culture of the 1970s.
They say music goes in cycles - well for a period in the 70s we decided to celebrate all things 50s! Showaddywaddy's Dave Bartram has hits from Alvin Stardust, Mud, Darts & Grease!
Classic hits from just 1 year - 1975!
2 hours of disco babes who ruled the dancefloors! From Labelle & Lipps Inc to Tina Charles & Sister Sledge - it's all girl singers, all the way!
Pat Man selects 30 chart toppers of the 70s that have probably slipped your mind! Expect lesser remembered hits from Mud, Dr Hook, David Cassidy, Lena Martell & Brotherhood of Man.
Feelgood hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots and flares at the ready?
In year order - the 70 biggest party tunes of the 70s! Every one of them a chart topper.
